title: Can not access google services like search, calendar,...
content: Hi guys. I can access google services like google search, calendar in private browsing but it does not work without the private mode. Could someone suggest to me any solution to this problem?
creator: minhluong126

title: I'm getting a "java void" when I go to a website and it won't open any files.  I'm old and not tech savvy.  Help?
content: Please give this old lady a baby step by baby step way to fix this java void thing? Like I said, I'm not tech savvy but I can usually follow clear instructions. It just showed up yesterday and I don't think I've added anything to the computer to make this happen. But it's really frustrating. I do appreciate any help you can offer. Thank you.
creator: dawnearle

title: Sometimes restores older session
content:
Firefox 105.03 (64-bit) Windows 11 Pro version 21H2

Using Firefox restore session, sometimes this restores the previous session (correct), but occasionally it restores a session from weeks earlier (wrong). Why and how to stop it doing this?
creator: pamelap1

title: Scroll wheel click no longer works in Firefox exclusively
content:
Ever since yesterday, scroll click (I use it to scroll through websites) has stopped working in Firefox. Works in in programs, other browsers, etc., just not Firefox.

Whats weird is it still registers a click when I use it, so I can lick on links with it if I want, but the function of scrolling, either by clicking once and using my mouse to go up and down, or by clicking an holding, no longer works.

I've tried disabling add-ons, incognito mode, nothing seems to work.
creator: firefox.6hauh

title: Firefox is not working
content: Several nights ago I shut down as normal and had not been having any issues. When I booted the next morning everything had gone haywire. I could not open any bookmarked in Firefox. I would click on a link in my Most Visited bookmark and a tab would open but nothing would happen. I could click on a link in an e-mail (Thunderbird) and the same thing would happen. I am able to run MS Edge without any problems. My Firefox version is 105.0.3 (64-bit) and my windows version is Win10 Pro version 21H2. I cannot figure out what has happened and don't want to lose Firefox.
creator: AZCowboy

title: Snooze Posts
content: When hiding a post, there were also 2 snooze options - 30 days and forever. They are no longer available in the pop up box when I click on the "...". What happened and how can they be restored? Thanks, Larry
creator: fedorczykl

title: personalizar loja na plataforma SHOPIFY
content: Fiz uma compra no OLYMPOS para personalizar minha loja na SHOPIFY, durante o passo a passo, surgiu uma problema, acredito uma falha no sistema e a OLYMPOS autorizou navegar em outro aplicativo, e me passaram esse link, como faço para dá continuadade a personalização, inclusive a loja já esta aberta na plataforma da shopify.
creator: ednacampos12

title: Download and Add Bookmark windows are huge.
content: The download and Add Bookmark windows are suddenly huge. I've tried different methods such as doing a clean reinstallation and changing the layout.css.devPixelsPerPx value in about:config but it's not showed results. Are there any options I could tweak to make these windows smaller?
creator: kieran1hconradie

title: old foxfire toolbar
content: i got a new computer and could not remember the old password to my foxfire account the email was [email]@wisperwireless.com and that is not available at this time. when i tried the phone number it said it was not the right one and i have had it for years. when i got the new computer i tried to sinc it and it did but not with that information with the new account. Any other way i can get the old toolbar icons back
creator: Troubledspirit53
